Description: Mandatory and optional tags for AWS AI/ML resources to ensure accurate cost allocation and unit economics tracking.

MandatoryTags.Description: The lifecycle stage of the resource.
The primary team/cost center responsible for the spend (e.g., team-data-science, team-platform).
Unique ID for the specific AI project or model being developed/served (e.g., genai-chatbot-v3, nlp-sentiment-v2).

AIMLOptionalTags.Description: Distinguishes between bursty vs. sustained compute needs.
The denominator for cost-per-unit tracking (e.g., Tokens, Queries, Epochs).
Used to track if the resource is intentionally using a specific optimization strategy.
